title: Youth Parliament officials to participate in 2022 Model United Nations Conference
body_lines: Kalutara District Youth Parliament Member Mohamed Mufthy (left) and Youth Parliament External Affairs Deputy Minister Ahmed Sadiq – Pic by Ruzaik Farook

The 2022 Model United Nations Conference (Best Diplomats) is being held in the United Arab Emirates from 20 to 23 May 2022. Youth Parliament External Affairs Deputy Minister Ahmed Sadiq, and Kalutara District Youth Parliament Member Mohamed Mufthy left to UAE to participate in the conference. The theme of the conference was “Russia-Ukraine Conflicts and the Opinions of International Youth”.
